name: Essentials Gift Pack
description:
The Essentials Gift Pack contains a selection of our most popular products, making it an ideal gift for a baby shower or to celebrate the arrival of a new little bairn. 

The pack includes a baby teddy bear and comes beautifully wrapped in a white gift box. 

Contains:

- 1 x Bottom Balm 100g
- 1 x Milk & Honey Bath Soak 120g
- 1 x Pure Bath & Massage Oil 100g
- 1 x Sleepy Time Nursery Spray 100ml
- 1 x Baby Teddy Bear

name: Bottom Balm
description:
A blend of soothing oils and natural beeswax to ensure your little bairn's delicate bottom remains soft and protected. Certified organic evening primrose and calendula oils nourish and heal inflamed skin, while added tea tree oil works to fight fungal and other skin infections.

To use:
Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin at each nappy change. Cloth nappy safe. 

Other uses:
- May be used to help heal cuts, grazes, bites and minor burns.
- For the whole family, use on dry, chapped skin anywhere on the body, including lips.

Ingredients:
Pure sweet almond oil, castor oil, *liquid shea butter, beeswax, *calendula infused oil (in sunflower oil), *evening primrose oil, natural vitamin e, *lavender french oil, *tea tree oil
*certified organic ingredients

name: Soft Touch Healing Balm
description:
An ultra-soft balm formulated with pure organic oils chosen especially for their skin healing properties. The balm contains a high proportion of calendula and rose hip oil, both known for their superior ability to regenerate and heal damaged skin. 
Enriched with certified organic tamanu oil and shea butter, this is a multi-use healing balm that can be enjoyed by the whole family. Use on bites, scrapes and minor burns, as well as dry skin, cradle cap and other skin irritations. 

To use:
Massage into affected skin until absorbed. 

Other uses:
- Apply to dribble rash or wind-chapped cheeks. 
- Use to soothe red, sore nappy rash.
- For mum, use on chapped lips and/or dry hands.

Ingredients: 
*Calendula infused oil (in sunflower oil), castor oil, *rose hip oil, beeswax, *liquid shea butter, *tamanu oil, natural vitamin e, *lavender french oil, *chamomile roman oil
*certified organic ingredients

name: Milk & Honey Bath Soak
description:
A milky soak designed to gently nourish your little bairn's delicate skin. With organic oatmeal and powders of chamomile, calendula and marshmallow root, this 100 per cent natural powder will help to soothe dry, irritated and inflamed skin. Ideal for cleansing delicate, newborn skin in place of a body wash.

To use:
Add approximately one tablespoon to warm bath water and allow to dissolve. For small baby baths, less powder will be needed. 

Please note that the powder will discolour bath water. This is a result of the product containing unbleached, natural botanicals.

Other uses:
- Use to ease the discomfort of chicken pox.
- For mum, perfect as a soothing postpartum soak.

Ingredients:
Buttermilk powder, *oat kernel flower, cornstartch, honey powder, calendula powder, chamomile powder, marshmallow root powder
*certified organic ingredients

name: Gentle Body Lotion
description:
A soothing blend of certified organic rose hip, evening primrose, jojoba and camellia oils to calm and nourish the most delicate baby skin. Enriched with organic shea butter, this light lotion is incredibly pure and gentle. Ideal for the the newest, most sensitive baby skin. 
99 per cent organic ingredients. 

To use:
Apply daily, or as as often as needed, to protect skin and lock in moisture. 

Other uses:
- For mum, light enough to use as a daily facial moisturiser.

Ingredients:
Purified water, *camellia oil, *olive emulsifier (cetearyl glucoside and sorbitan olivate), *liquid shea butter, *evening primrose oil, *rose hip oil, *jojoba oil, natural vitamin e, *parfum (natural preservative), xanthan gum, potassium sorbate 
*certified organic ingredients

name: 'Happy Baby' Nursery Spray
description:
A refreshing mist of orange blossom and red mandarin that will help create a space of calm for your little bairn. The spray carries only a gentle scent to ensure it is not too overpowering for a baby's delicate senses.

To use:
Spray nursery and bedding to help renew and relax an unsettled baby. 

Other uses:
- Use as a cleansing spray at nappy change time.
- For mum, use as a natural facial toner or a 'pick-me-up' spray (perfect for when in labour!)
- Spray car seats, playmats and toys to help eliminate odours.

Ingredients:
Orange blossom infused water, capryl glucoside, *mandarin red oil, potassium sorbate
*certified organic ingredients

name: 'Sleepy Time' Nursery Spray
description:
A calming mist of lavender and chamomile that will help create a peaceful sleep environment for your little bairn. The spray carries only a gentle scent to ensure it is not too overpowering for a baby's delicate senses. 

To use:
Spray nursery and bedding to help soothe your little one before sleep. 

Other uses:
- Use as a cleansing spray at nappy change time.
- For mum, use as a hydrating face mist to help de-stress.
- Spray car seats, playmats and toys to help eliminate odours.  

Ingredients:
Lavender infused water, chamomile roman infused water, capryl glucoside, *lavender french oil, potassium sorbate, *chamomile roman oil
*certified organic ingredients

name: 'Pure' Bath & Massage Oil
description:
A pure blend of jojoba, camellia and sweet almond oil that will leave your little bairn's skin incredibly nourished. This 100 per cent natural oil is suitable for everyday use.

To use:
Warm a small amount of oil between hands before massaging into skin. Alternatively, add a few drops to a warm bath to moisturise and protect skin.

Other uses:
- For cradle cap, massage into scalp to soften skin. Leave to absorb overnight before gently washing hair and lifting away dead skin with a soft brush.
- For mum, use as a body oil throughout pregnancy and beyond. Both camellia and jojoba oil are noted for their ability to prevent and treat stretch marks.

Ingredients: 
Pure sweet almond oil, *jojoba oil, *camellia oil, natural vitamin e 
*certified organic ingredients

name: 'Happy Baby' Bath & Massage Oil
description:
A pure blend of jojoba, camellia and sweet almond oil that will leave your little bairn's skin incredibly nourished. With the addition of red mandarin and orange blossom, this uplifting oil may be helpful in settling an irritable or tired baby.

To use:
Warm a small amount of oil between hands before massaging into skin. Alternatively, add a few drops to a warm bath to moisturise and protect skin.

Other uses:
- For cradle cap, massage oil into scalp to soften skin. Leave to absorb overnight before gently washing hair and lifting away dead skin with a soft brush. 
- For mum, use as a belly oil from the fourth month of pregnancy. Mandarin essential oil, camellia oil and jojoba oil are all noted for their ability to help prevent stretch marks. 

Ingredients:
Pure sweet almond oil, *jojoba oil, *camellia oil, natural vitamin e, *mandarin red oil, *neroli oil
*certified organic ingredients

name: 'Sleepy Time' Bath & Massage Oil
description:
A pure blend of jojoba, camellia and sweet almond oil that will leave your little bairn's skin incredibly nourished. With the addition of lavender and chamomile, this calming oil may be used to prepare your little one for the land of nod. 

To use:
Warm a small amount of oil between hands before massaging into skin. Alternatively, add a few drops to a warm bath to moisturise and protect skin.

Other uses:
- For cradle cap, massage oil into scalp to soften skin. Leave to absorb overnight before gently washing hair and lifting away dead skin with a soft brush.
- For mum, help renew tired legs by gently massaging them with a small amount of oil before bedtime.

Ingredients:
Pure sweet almond oil, *jojoba oil, *camellia oil, natural vitamin e, *lavender french oil, *chamomile roman oil
*certified organic ingredients

name: Certified Organic Rose Hip Oil
description:
Rich in vitamins and fatty acids (omega 3 and 6), rose hip oil helps to regenerate and repair damaged skin. It is also highly moisturising, making it ideal for easing sensitive skin conditions. Sourced from Chile, our rose hip oil is cold-pressed and unrefined.

To use:
For baby, apply 2-3 drops to soothe dry skin, cradle cap and other skin irritations. For mum, apply sparingly to face and/or body. Perfect for fine lines, scars and stretch marks.

* Please note that rose hip oil is a thick, 'slow drip' oil, meaning it takes a moment to make its way through the bottle's dripper.

Other uses:
- For mum, use in place of a night serum to repair and rejuvenate skin ...  a great anti-ageing treatment that can reduce the appearance of fine lines and pigmentation. 
- Also for mum, add a few drops to dry, damaged hair. Perfect for those fly-aways that often appear after pregnancy!
- Suitable as an all-over massage oil for baby.
- Apply directly to scars to reduce their appearance.

Ingredients:
Certified organic rose hip oil

name: Gift Voucher ($20)
description:
Looking for a convenient baby shower gift? Our gift vouchers come in denominations of $20, $50 and $100. 

Gift vouchers will be shipped to you to personalise and give to the recipient.  

If you would like us to send the voucher directly to the recipient (either by post or email) please contact us after checkout. 


The fine print:
- Gift vouchers are valid for a period of 12 months from the date of purchase. Vouchers must be redeemed in full within this period as any unused balance will not be refunded or credited on expiry.
- The gift voucher is partially redeemable and can be used for multiple purchases (up to the value of the voucher) within the 12-month validity period.
- Gift vouchers are not redeemable for cash.
- If the purchase exceeds the amount of the gift voucher an invoice will be issued for the balance, which can then be paid via Paypal or EFT.  
- One or more vouchers can be redeemed against an order.
- A flat-rate postage fee of $5 (Australia-wide) applies to all purchases.
- Lost or stolen vouchers will not be replaced or refunded.
